property.name: tabs
property.label: Tabs
property.description: JSON string with the tabs to display.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: The variant changes the appearance of the tabset. Accepted variants are standard and scoped.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Displays tooltip text when the mouse moves over the tabset.

property.name: selectedTab
property.label: Selected Tab
property.description: Sets a specific tab to open by default using a string that matches a tab's value string. If not used, the first tab opens by default.

property.name: activeTab
property.label: Active Tab
property.description: Sets a specific tab to open by default using a string that matches a tab's value string. If not used, the first tab opens by default.
